table.stmt: SELECT a.FItemID AS customerid, a.FparentID AS parentid, a.fname AS customername, a.FMobilePhone AS Mobile, a.FPhone AS Phone, a.FContact AS Contact, ogt.FItemID AS CustomerTypeID, ogt.FName AS CustomerType, b.FName AS Province, c.FName AS City, a.F_106 AS AreaCounty, a.FAddress AS Address, FPostalCode AS PostCode, s.FDeleted AS Status, s.fnumber AS CustomerCode, s.FLevel as level FROM [AIS20130314203706].[dbo].[t_Organization] a JOIN [AIS20130314203706].[dbo].[CRM_Province] b ON a.FProvinceID = b.FID JOIN [AIS20130314203706].[dbo].[CRM_City] c ON a.FCityID = c.FID JOIN [AIS20130314203706].[dbo].[t_Item_3017] ogt ON a.F_107 = ogt.FItemID JOIN [AIS20130314203706].[dbo].[t_Item] s ON a.FItemID=s.FItemID WHERE s.FDeleted = 0 AND a.FName not LIKE '%撤%' AND a.FName not LIKE '%保证金%' AND s.fnumber not LIKE '*%' AND s.fnumber not LIKE 'Z%' ORDER BY b.FName

SELECT i.FItemID AS customerid, i.FParentID AS parentid, i.FName AS customername, i.FDeleted AS Status, i.Fnumber AS CustomerCode, i.FLevel AS level FROM [AIS20130314203706].[dbo].[t_Item] i WHERE i.FItemClassID=1 and i.FName not like'%撤%' AND i.fnumber not LIKE '*%' AND i.fnumber not LIKE 'Z%' and i.FItemID not in( SELECT FItemID FROM [AIS20130314203706].[dbo].[t_Organization])
